title: Did Bayden claim 6,114 military deaths when there were seven?
subtitle: In a speech delivered in September 2020, American Democratic Presidential candidate Joe Baiden stumbled on figures relating to the death of the military of Koved-19.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: During the Michigan campaign in September 2020, United States Democratic Presidential candidate Joe Baiden wrongly declared that there were 6,114 "military deaths from COVID" and 118,984 "military infection from COVID." There were only seven.
